sentences.en: He amazed me by his audacity.
He had the audacity to ask for an increase in salary.
sentences.cn: 他竟然厚着脸皮要求增加薪水.

sentences.en: He had the audacity to pick pockets in broad daylight.
sentences.cn: 他竟敢在光天化日之下掏包.

sentences.en: He had the audacity to say I was too fat.
sentences.cn: 他竟敢放肆地说我太肥胖。

sentences.en: He had the audacity to take people off the street corners.
sentences.cn: 他有胆量把在街头巷尾的人都安排了工作.

sentences.en: He had the audacity which comes from a sense of complete innocence.
sentences.cn: 他有一种胆量,这种胆量来自他的天真.

sentences.en: He heard it numbly, a little amazed at his audacity.
sentences.cn: 他自己也听得一呆, 对自己的莽撞劲儿有点吃惊.

sentences.en: I can’t believe he had the audacity to ask me for more money!
sentences.cn: 我真不敢相信，他竟胆敢还向我要钱！

sentences.en: I was shocked at the audacity and brazenness of the gangsters.
sentences.cn: 这伙歹徒如此胆大妄为、厚颜无耻，让我很是震惊。

sentences.en: I, for one, admire his audacity.
sentences.cn: 比如说，我就很钦佩他的胆识。

sentences.en: She was quite appalled at the man's audacity.
sentences.cn: 这家伙的大胆无礼把她吓坏了.

sentences.en: Sky - diving takes both audacity and skill.
sentences.cn: 特技跳伞需要胆量和技巧.

sentences.en: The audacity of the chief's proposal nearly paralysed them.
sentences.cn: 头目的大胆建议几乎把他们吓呆了.

sentences.en: The bashfulness contrasting with his usual happy audacity had charmed her.
sentences.cn: 他的腼腆与他平时使她着迷的肆无忌惮的快活劲儿形成鲜明的对比.

sentences.en: The book is anodd combination of audacity andintense conservatism.
sentences.cn: 那本书很怪,所谈内容既很大胆,又非常保守.

sentences.en: The president of the Republic oscillated between a certain audacity and a prudent realism.
sentences.cn: 该共和国总统施政风格时而大胆冒进，时而谨慎务实。

words.tran_cn: 无畏地；放肆地；大胆创新地；无拘无束地

trans.tran_cn: 大胆，鲁莽，胆大妄为，鲁莽行为
trans.tran_en: the quality of having enough courage to take risks or say impolite things
